text: Angelo Glisoni (born 20 June 1957) is an Italian former yacht racer who competed in the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 1992 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Tornado class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Italy
title: Angelo Glisoni
